Title: Proposes a constitutional amendment to increase the terms of office of members of the legislature to four years
Summary: Proposes a constitutional amendment to increase the terms of office of members of the legislature to four years and limit the terms of office a member of the legislature may serve.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 2 of article 3 of the constitution, in relation to increasing the terms of office of members of the legislature to four years
